features: [Crystal Clear Sound] - The wireless usb-c lavalier microphone is built with brilliant noise cancellation chips to reduce unpleasant background noise and sponge windscreen to avoid plosives. The clip on mic for usb c phone stands ready to deliver excellent sound quality and provide optimal recording experience.

[10 Hour-Working Battery & 100Ft Long Range Recording] - Our wireless Lapel microphone is equipped with high quality rechargeable 110mah battery and can work for 10 hours non-stop on a full charge. The maximum effective distance of the wireless clip microphone for android reaches up to 100 feet.

[Omnidirectional Recording & Automatic Noise Reduction] - Our omnidirectional type c lapel mic is empowered to pick up sound from all around while blocking out ambient screech and noise, thus ensuring stereo, vivid and euphonic sound. The android phone microphones is for video recording,street interview, tiktok shorts, instagram reels.

[Wide Compatibility] - The wireless USB C lav microphone is widely compatible with almost all type C devices including but not limited to Android smartphones, iPhone 15 (USB-C) laptops, personal computers and tablets Samsung Galaxy S21/S20/S10+/S10e/S10, Note 20 Ultra/20/10+/9, Google Pixel, OnePlus, iPad(USB-C) and most USB Type-C port device. This cordless clip-on mic for android comes in handy when it comes to video recording, live streaming, podcasting, vlogging and the more. [Note]: In rare cases, the mic could not work with the android’s original camera. If connection fails, please enable the "OTG" in the setting of your phone.

[Plug and Play & Auto Pairing] - This mini usbc lapel mic is easy to use, simply plug it in and you can instantly start using it as this small mic with auto sync is able to connect automatically. The cell phone clip-on microphone for android is user-friendly, plug and play.

[Dual-People Pickup] - The 2 pack android lav mics are capable of picking up sound from two people speaking simultaneously. The feature is specially designed for interviews, live streaming and podcasting, TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, FaceBook and other social media, perfect for content creators and vlogger.
Professional Customer Service and Support: We provide 12 months warranty and support service. The package includes two wireless microphone, USB-C receiver, 2-in-1charging cable, user manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2 Pack Lavalier Microphones with Nosie Reduction - [Compatible with All USB C Port Devices] Wireless Lapel Microphones for Android Phone and Other Typec C Port Devices [100 FT Effective Working Distance] - The long-range lavalier mics is able to record your voice at 100FT(30M). The wireless USB C microphones still can work like a charm at 50FT(15M) when there is a barrier like a door blocking the signal. [10 Hour Long-Lasting & Rechargeable Battery] - The long-lasting lapel microphones can work continuously for 10 hours. The lapel mics is bulit with rechargeable 110mah battery so that you don't have to charge the mic once and again. [Auto Pairing, Hassle-Free Setup, Easy to Use] - The plug and play collar mic is easy to use, hassle-free, cutting all confusing steps to save your valuable time. [One-Touch Mute Button, Quick Response] - To mute the shirt mic, all you need to do is press the mute button and you can also tell if it is muted by checking the indicator light status.

Cordless Lav Mic for Video Recording - Long Range and Low Latency Recording Clip-On Microphone with 10H Battery - Noise Reduction and Auto Pairing 360 degree Omnidirectional Mic: The wireless shirt microphones pick up sound from all directions, providing stereo, natural and vivid sound. Upgraded Version: 1 to 2 mic for two people speaking simultaneously, omnidirectional pickup, steady connection of low latency 40KHZ Sample Rate: 40khz cordless collar microphones offers CD-Grade sound quality.Upgraded 2.4Ghz Wireless Technology for Long Distance Recording - steady and long-range connection. Compatible with with devices with USB-C portsOmnidirectional built-in mic for 360° sound pickupAutomatic pairing & plug&play

Various Application Scenarios - Open UP the Possibilities The NPTCL Type C Lavalier Microphone is suitable for live streaming, interviewing, video recording and is especially designed for podcasters, youtubers, teachers and office workers. These 2 mini shirt mics deliver crystal clear sound, making your life more easier, work more efficient. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent mic for phone / laptop use in presentations
reviews.reviewText: I am using this mic set to help with online meetings. The link between the usb-c adapter and mics have worked quite well. The mic set has helped out team hold meetings that can be understood even when in noisy restaurants.By having this mic set have a usb-c adapter vs Bluetooth, I can use it on any modern laptop and most phones. This helps as some of our volunteers have locked down laptops that can't add Bluetooth devices.In general we only work with one mic, and hold the other as a reserve, but we have had meetings where we needed to use both, and did so with no issues.The size of these are nice they are not much bigger than a thumb drive or rsa token.Also, there are no drivers to install - so that is a nice surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wireless Freedom for Crystal-Clear Audio: NPTCL 2 Pack Lavalier Microphone USB C Review
reviews.reviewText: In a world dominated by remote communication and content creation, finding a reliable and versatile microphone is crucial. The NPTCL 2 Pack Lavalier Microphone USB C stands out as an excellent solution for those seeking wireless convenience and exceptional audio quality, particularly for Android phones and iPhones.Pros:1. Wireless Connectivity:The USB C compatibility ensures a seamless connection to a variety of devices, including Android phones and iPhones. The wireless design provides freedom of movement, allowing users to create content without being tethered to their devices.2. Exceptional Sound Quality:The NPTCL lav mic delivers clear and crisp audio, making it ideal for a range of applications, from video calls and online meetings to content creation and live streaming. The noise-canceling feature significantly reduces background noise, ensuring that your voice remains the star of the show.3. User-Friendly Design:The compact and lightweight design of the lavalier microphone makes it easy to clip onto clothing discreetly. The USB C connection ensures a secure fit and compatibility with a wide range of devices. Setup is a breeze, making it accessible even for those new to audio equipment.4. Durable Build Quality:The microphone is well-built, with a robust construction that can withstand the rigors of regular use. The durability adds value for those who require a reliable microphone for daily tasks or on-the-go content creation.5. Versatility:The NPTCL 2 Pack offers flexibility with its dual-pack configuration. This is especially useful for interviews, collaborations, or scenarios where multiple microphones are needed. The versatility of the USB C connection further expands its compatibility, making it a valuable tool for various devices.Cons:1. Limited Range:While the wireless design provides freedom, it's essential to note that the range may be limited compared to some dedicated wireless microphone systems. Users should be mindful of their distance from the recording device for optimal performance.Final Thoughts:The NPTCL 2 Pack Lavalier Microphone USB C is a standout choice for individuals seeking a reliable, wireless microphone solution for Android phones and iPhones. Its excellent sound quality, ease of use, and versatile compatibility make it a valuable addition to any content creator's toolkit. Whether you're recording videos, participating in virtual meetings, or conducting interviews, the NPTCL lav mic ensures that your voice is heard with clarity and precision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Well for Videos
reviews.reviewText: I bought these microphones because I am an IT student and I had to create a video tutorial for YouTube. I have a very soft speaking voice and did not want to force myself to talk louder than normal for the video. I got the microphone to make sure my voice sounds louder and clearer for the video and this worked perfectly. I also tested it for TikTok as well and it is a game changer. It comes with two microphones, two clips for if you want to clip the mics on something, and also comes with a charger and the microphones link through Bluetooth seamlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought I needed this for a school project to record both my voice and someone else's. Right off the bat, it was very simple to set up and use. When using it, I can hear it loud and clear! Sadly, I never got to use it for the project but handed it to a friend. She loves it too! Noise cancelling is fairly good, there is a bit of noise in the background but that's pretty common so I'm totally fine with it as well as the friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An awesome wireless microphone package!
reviews.reviewText: You won't find a better wireless unit than this at an exceptional price!The unit comes in a well packaged aluminum case to protect the receiver, mics, clips, and charging cords.A very easy plug-and-play system that immediately connected simply by plugging the Receiver into your choice of iPhone or iPad (I tested on both) and turning on the microphones. The clips for the lapel for the microphones are secure and without a lock for easy assembly and dis-assembly for storage.The noise cancelling feature is superb as I did not pick up any background noise and was able to boost recorded voice-overs at a much higher and clearer volume.The best feature is the fact that you can connect both microphones at the same time in order to achieve a high-quality interview. Highly recommend - couldn't be a simpler system with a secure storage to protect the components.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For how inexpensive this product is, I honestly wasn’t expecting much. The first time I used it, it instantly proved me wrong! I’m a social media manager and needed something to do short “vlog” style interviews with, and the quality of the audio that this wireless mic gives me changed the way I do videos for my job. It’s also seamlessly easy to use, and connects to your phone pretty much automatically. Definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best microphone!
reviews.reviewText: I love that it comes with two microphones.It’s so easy to connect them it’s literally plug and play. The sound quality is fantastic and I don’t hear background noise at all. It’s perfect for YouTubers or people who need that focused sound and not hearing everything and everyone in the background and then having to edit it out post production. I would order these again when they don’t work anymore but so far they are still doing good weeks later. Good price for the value.
Fonctionne super bien essayer seulement 2 fois mais super bien été pour le prix ça le fait bien.

I've only used these mics a few times but I have to say I'm impressed with the functionality and sound quality at this price point. A tiny bit of background noise is audible, but nothing too distracting.Easy to set up and use, and so far no issues with quality. If you're looking for decent lav mics on a budget, you can't go wrong with these.

reviews.reviewTitle: Surprised how well it works for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use for promotional videos we make for our Tanning salon. Always lots of loud background noise from the beds when they're running.This microphone does an amazing job of picking up my wife's voice and not the background noise. For the price I'm genuinely surprised how well it works.Using it on an S22+ ultra, plug and play with no issue whatsoever.Well worth the cost.
This mic would have been a 5 star rating if the box where you keep it a little bigger to accommodate the microphone with the clip on! But in general it is great sound quality and light weight.
These mics do exactly what they say, they're easy to use too.
